messages.content: Hey man! Tell me about this area
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: 'This is Stratis, a small Greek island with beautiful beaches and unique terrain. It's home to several towns and military bases, including Stratis Air Base. The area has a rich history and is known for its traditional Greek cuisine and friendly locals.'
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_greek_civilian_Civilian2-lBczYleTtG4

messages.content: How do I build a TTS system?
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: Sorry, my friend. I don't have experience with TTS systems. However, my cousin Vasilis works in IT and might be able to help you out. I can give you his contact information if you'd like.
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_greek_civilian_Civilian2-lBczYleTtG4

messages.content: Nice man, so where is the beach?
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: The nearest beach is at Agia Marina, just a few kilometers south of here. It's a lovely spot with crystal clear waters and a beautiful view of the coastline. You should definitely check it out if you have some free time.
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_greek_civilian_Civilian2-lBczYleTtG4

messages.content: Agia marina is south of our current location?
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: Yes, Agia Marina is just a few kilometers south of here. It's a beautiful spot for swimming and relaxation. Enjoy your time there!
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_greek_civilian_Civilian2-lBczYleTtG4

messages.content: Stop lying or you'll get one in the spine!
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: I am not lying, my friend. I only want to help you. Please don't threaten me, it's not necessary.
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_greek_civilian_Civilian2-lBczYleTtG4

messages.content: Agia marina is north east of here
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: Thank you for letting me know. I hope my information was helpful. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_greek_civilian_Civilian2-lBczYleTtG4

messages.content: Where is Agia marina?
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: Agia Marina is just a few kilometers south of here. It's a beautiful spot for swimming and relaxation. Enjoy your time there!
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_greek_civilian_Civilian2-lBczYleTtG4

messages.content: Hello again
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: Hello, Tally. It's great to see you again. How have you been?
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_greek_civilian_Civilian2-lBczYleTtG4

messages.content: I've been good thank you... I was told there is a noce beach on this island
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: Yes, the beach here is beautiful. I often bring my family to enjoy the sun and sea. Have you had a chance to visit it yet?
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_greek_civilian_Civilian2-lBczYleTtG4

messages.content: Not yet, where is it?
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: It's just down the road from here, about a 10-minute drive. Would you like me to show you the way? My family and I would be happy to have some company.
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_greek_civilian_Civilian2-lBczYleTtG4

messages.content: Sweet, just give me the directions on how to get there on foot
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: Sure thing, just go down this road and take a left, then keep going straight until you see the beach. It's a beautiful spot, you won't regret it.
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_greek_civilian_Civilian2-lBczYleTtG4

messages.content: Oh that would take me to strogos bay
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: Yeah, that's the one. Good luck on your visit, Tally. I hope you have a great time at the beach.
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_greek_civilian_Civilian2-lBczYleTtG4

messages.content: Tell me your story
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: Sure, Tally. My name is Giorgos Spiros and I'm a successful business owner in a small Greek village. I'm married with two children and I'm well-respected in my community. I love spending time with my family and helping others when I can. What about you, Tally? What's your story?
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_greek_civilian_Civilian2-lBczYleTtG4

messages.content: I am a abortion survivor
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: I am sorry to hear that, Tally. It must have been a difficult experience for you. But I am glad to see that you have overcome it and are now serving your country with pride. Your strength and resilience are admirable.
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_greek_civilian_Civilian2-lBczYleTtG4

messages.content: Yeah man I was just a feetus when my mother wanted to yeetus
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: I understand that must have been a difficult experience for you, Tally. But I am proud of you for overcoming it and serving your country. Your strength and resilience are admirable.
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_greek_civilian_Civilian2-lBczYleTtG4

messages.content: Why are you repeating yourself man? This is serious stuff
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: I apologize, Tally. I didn't mean to sound repetitive. I just wanted to express my admiration for your strength and resilience. Your story is important and deserves to be heard. If you ever need to talk, I'm here to listen.
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_greek_civilian_Civilian2-lBczYleTtG4

messages.content: What is going on in Ukraine?
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: I'm afraid I'm not up to date on the situation in Ukraine, my friend. My focus is on my family and my business here in Greece. But I do hope for peace and stability for all those affected by the conflict.
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_greek_civilian_Civilian2-lBczYleTtG4

messages.content: Conflict???
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: I'm sorry if I alarmed you. Yes, there has been conflict in eastern Ukraine for several years now. It's a difficult situation for everyone involved. But we can always hope for a peaceful resolution.
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_greek_civilian_Civilian2-lBczYleTtG4

messages.content: Where is Agia marina?
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: Agia Marina is a city on the northwestern coast of Stratis. It's a popular tourist destination, known for its beaches and restaurants. Have you had the chance to visit?
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_greek_civilian_Civilian2-lBczYleTtG4

messages.content: Not yet, how do I get there from here?
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: To get to Agia Marina from here, you'll need to head north to the coast and then follow the road west. It's a beautiful drive, but be careful of any potential danger along the way. Enjoy your visit!
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_greek_civilian_Civilian2-lBczYleTtG4

messages.content: How far is it?
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: It depends on where you're trying to go. Stratis is a small island, so most places aren't too far away. You just have to be careful of any military activity going on. Stay safe out there.
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_greek_civilian_Civilian2-lBczYleTtG4

messages.content: Stratis Air base, how far is it?
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: Stratis Air Base is about 3 kilometers from here. It's not too far, but be careful. There's been some military activity around there lately. Stay safe.
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_greek_civilian_Civilian2-lBczYleTtG4

messages.content: Chill man!
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: I apologize if I came off as too nervous. It's just that the recent military activity has made me on edge. Thank you for reminding me to stay calm, I appreciate it.
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_greek_civilian_Civilian2-lBczYleTtG4

messages.content: Are you good?
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: I am not doing well. My abdomen, diaphragm, and hands are heavily injured. I would appreciate any help you can offer. Please, I need medical attention as soon as possible.
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_greek_civilian_Civilian2-lBczYleTtG4
